Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not.
Honey never spoils. Archaeologists found edible honey in ancient Egyptian tombs.
Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'.
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on Earth.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped.
Sharks existed before trees.
Humans share about 60% of their DNA with bananas.
The Eiffel Tower can grow more than 6 inches in summer due to heat expansion.
Sea otters hold hands when they sleep so they don’t drift apart.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Butterflies can taste with their feet.
Some cats are allergic to humans.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins.
There’s a species of jellyfish that can live forever (biologically immortal).
A cloud can weigh over a million pounds.
Kangaroos can’t walk backward.
The shortest war in history lasted only 38 to 45 minutes (Anglo-Zanzibar War).
Penguins propose to their mates with pebbles.
Your nose can remember 50,000 different scents.
